metadata.title: CVE-2022-1587 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in the PCRE2 library inthe get_recurse_data_length() function of the pcre2_jit_compile.c file.This issue affects recursions in JIT-compiled regular expressions caused byduplicate data transfers.

criterions.comment: pcre2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
